name: CDK
description: CodeNekt is a mobility platform creating a digital passport for vehicles using blockchain. It tokenizes real-world vehicles as NFTs, enabling secure, transparent and user-controlled access to service history, ownership and maintenance data. Through its native token $CDK, users will pay for services, earn rewards and interact with garages, insurers and fleets seamlessly. Key use cases include: - Verifiable vehicle history - Decentralized vehicle identity - Streamlined fleet and maintenance management
